This is a classic game that introduced new physics with the portal gun. I have wanted to play this game for years and I am glad I did. Its short but i would rather play a short and well built game like this one than crappy long one.
It is a work of art and a must play for everyone who like riddles.
beat the game the best game ever i would go through pain to get this game!

This is an amazing puzzle game with an interesting story. If you think this game was fun, I could not recommend the Portal 2 enough.
What can I say about a perfect game?
Great puzzle solving game, where you are the lab-rat that has to find the "cheese".
Even people who don't like video games will like this game.  The voice actress for GLaDOS doesn't play video games at all... but she plays this one.

"Portal" is the start to the well known game series of "Portal". Let's be honest, the game series is genuinely considered the best game series of all time. Why else would people want a "Portal 3" so badly? Anyways, I'm getting carried away. "Portal" is the first and scariest game of the "Portal" series. The ambience and atmosphere of the game genuinely makes you feel watched, and paranoid during a full play-through. Not only that, but the environmental storytelling of the game adds to the eerie environment. There are nothing but good things to say about the game. The sound design is awesome! One thing that I will always remember about "Portal" is the sound design. It's not the first thing I think about, but it is one of the first things I think about. And the graphics are definitely not as good as "Portal 2", but it adds to the eerie ambience of the game. So it works in favor of itself anyways. And the story of the game is funny and well-thought-out. And the mechanics of the game is obviously one of the best ever made. There is no glitches in the game as far as I'm concerned. It's just built so well! Honestly, I'm feeling a 9.1/10 on the game. It's great. It's a must play for any gamer.

Though it only took me 4 hours to complete, I am proud to have finally done it and got around to playing this legend of a game. I can just warmly recommend this to anyone enjoying sarcastic and cynical comments and setting. Subtle, ingenious and fun.

Quando conheci este jogo por indicação de um amigo eu não pensei que ele seria um jogo tão bom, superou todas as minhas expectativas. Quem ainda não teve a oportunidade de jogar e zerar ele, irá curtir bastante quando zerar ele pela primeira vez. É um jogo com uma história bem desenvolvida e envolvente, muito bom para quem também curte resolver puzzles.

honestly, almost seems like they made a rip off of that game portal 2! 3.23462349237/10 not recommended, (this is a joke its a great game)

The hype is well deserved and as real as cake.

Most of the game is pretty basic puzzle stuff.

Around Test 15, as you start to wonder if there is anything to this game, and you question what people considered challenging "back in the day", the puzzles suddenly become more involved.

Then, you say, okay, the challenge is there, but this still seems like a short game, I'm on the last test already!  But then, you have the "endgame" phase which is surprisingly as long as the entirety of the testing stages combined!

I've had this game for years but never played it because the description didn't seem appealing to me - a FPS without the "s".  I'm a man who can admit when I'm wrong.

the sequel makes this feel like a tech demo

still a great game
Very fun and funny with a gripping story. and some delicious cake
portal 2是我在steam上通关的第一个游戏，时隔多年来补1，谜题难度相较portal 2简单很多，但仍然好玩的很。片尾的歌以前在音乐软件上搜到过，当时玩了portal 2，还没补1，心想怎么感觉没听过这首歌呢，原来是1里的歌，很惊喜。希望早日玩到portal 3！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！
Very good game. Must play franchise overall. Nice price for a nice game. Oh, and you also get cake at the end!
